# SiteBasicInfo

**Properties**

| Name | Type | Required | Description                                                |
| :--- | :--- | :------- | :--------------------------------------------------------- |
| id\_ | str  | ✅       | Site extension identifier or "main-site" for the main site |
| name | str  | ✅       | Site name                                                  |
